doc.title: The Unspoken Truth
doc.plot: A gritty drama/thriller that centers around two sexy, affluent late-20s couples, Adam and Mary and Sean and Annette. All four know each other from college, and Adam and Sean are in business together and are building great success. Annette dies suddenly - not long after becoming pregnant with her first child. Sean goes off the handle and his psychological decline uncovers a multitude of past sins. Adam must save his friend before Sean destroys everything they've all worked so hard for. Sean, it turns out, has been leading something of a double life all along.
